name: Satan's Shakers
description:
After a mysterious death, you awake in an unfamiliar place only to learn that you have been banished to Hell.

Luckily for you, Satan has allowed you a chance to play his game of dice, Shakers, and if you win you can leave Hell with your soul in hand. Beware though! Satan is a trickster and will do whatever it takes to turn the tables to his advantage. 

With a little bit of luck, you may just find your way back to where you came from. 

Good luck!

Game has full keyboard and gamepad support.

This is the first game I've ever created and because of that it has a few quirks. Please be patient and let me know your thoughts! Leave a comment, send me a message on Twitter (@braktheman) or send a carrier pigeon.

Game only supports 16:9 resolutions full screen - any other will give you visual bugs and odd behaviors. If you experience any major issues, please try playing it in windowed mode in browser or the downloadable Windows build. Thank you!
